attributes.action: Allow the public to email the PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why has the ability to email the Prime Minister been removed.  See link http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page821.asp

All I wanted to do was ask Gordon Brown what his core vision was.  I will have to write via snail mail now.

What is the point in investing in new technologies when the government doesn't want to use it?

rejection.details: The email facility has been removed temporarily for essential work.  There are a variety of channels that you can use to contact the Prime Minister as refered to on http://www.number10.gov.uk/output/Page3.asp
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
